code: import axios from"axios";export var fetchAlbums=function fetchAlbums(){return axios.get("/api/albums");};export var fetchAlbum=function fetchAlbum(id){return axios.get("/api/albums/".concat(id));};export var searchAlbums=function searchAlbums(search){return axios.get("/api/albums/search/".concat(search));};export var toggleAlbumLike=function toggleAlbumLike(likeData){return axios.patch("api/albums/like/".concat(likeData.albumId),likeData);};
